title: Bug 134949: Themes nest in other library
description:
Bug 134949Themes nest in other library
Details:Themes nest in other library
Step:1.
OB: When attempting to drop a theme from Library B into a layout within Library A, an error message pops up stating that the library namespace 'B' already exists.
EB: The system should allow me to drop themes from one library into a layout within another library without displaying any error message.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Have Library A using Library B, with themes present in Library B.
2. Open the Library tree of Library A in the library explorer.
3. Drag and drop a theme from Library B into a layout within Library A.
